ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: Bindings for the 'Tabula' <http://tabula.technology/> 'Java' library, which can extract tables from PDF documents. The 'tabulizerjars' package <https://github.com/ropensci/tabulizerjars> provides versioned 'Java' .jar files, including all dependencies, aligned to releases of 'Tabula'.

Bindings for the 'Tabula' <http://tabula.technology/> 'Java' library, which can extract tables from PDF documents. The 'tabulizerjars' package <https://github.com/ropensci/tabulizerjars> provides versioned 'Java' .jar files, including all dependencies, aligned to releases of 'Tabula'.

name: r-tabulizer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.2.2' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-tabulizer
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/tabulizer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/tabulizer/tabulizer_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 71973a9b77fda698ece4dead6c7c5817d1bf3bd3f1ef1a386438c7c7b163a57d

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  script: R CMD INSTALL --build .
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-png
    - r-rjava
    - r-tabulizerjars
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-png
    - r-rjava
    - r-tabulizerjars

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('tabulizer')"

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/tabulizer
  license: MIT
  summary: Bindings for the 'Tabula' <http://tabula.technology/> 'Java' library, which can extract
    tables from PDF documents. The 'tabulizerjars' package <https://github.com/ropensci/tabulizerjars>
    provides versioned 'Java' .jar files, including all dependencies, aligned to releases
    of 'Tabula'.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf
